about_the_game:
Humans are still curious about nature.Discovering and exploring unsolved mysteries is a powerful motivation for every adventurer who loves exploring.
This black hole maze game is an adventure,fantasy and decryption game.The background setting is in a virtual underground maze world.Everywhere are magical tunnels and strange creatures.How do you choose the path to move forward.All the visible forks are so difficult to determine the endpoint.

Places to explore

At the beginning of the game.There is a tasks point closest to you.You can know where to go next to complete these tasks.You can judge your way forward by short mission description information.

Take action

The retention value or spiritual power can enable you to quickly leave when in danger.You must always pay attention to the changes in this number,as it becomes difficult to maintain longer running time and speed when the value becomes too low.

Life lies in exploration

You need to have health value to recover your stamina. Health value and Spirit value interact with each other. After being attacked by strange creatures, the remaining health value will be reduced. You can avoid these strange creatures after exploring some maze environments. Usually, these strange creatures have a very strong attack power. Good luck to you!
You need to have health value to recover your stamina. Health value and Spirit value interact with each other. After being attacked by strange creatures, the remaining health value will be reduced. You can avoid these strange creatures after exploring some maze environments. Usually, these strange creatures have a very strong attack power. Good luck to you!

Moving forward in the light

Underground caves and tunnels are usually not exposed to sunlight. Darkness will accompany you for a long time. In order to see the path ahead clearly, you must have a tool that helps you illuminate. At the start of the game or in the nearby area, you can find some tools for lighting.

Strange stones and chaotic caves

There are many strange stones hidden in the dark cave. The spirit of exploration drives people to go to these places to unravel those mysterious phenomena.
detailed_description:
Game Announcement

The developer has not yet released any announcement of the content.


About the Demo

Humans are still curious about nature.Discovering and exploring unsolved mysteries is a powerful motivation for every adventurer who loves exploring.
This black hole maze game is an adventure,fantasy and decryption game.The background setting is in a virtual underground maze world.Everywhere are magical tunnels and strange creatures.How do you choose the path to move forward.All the visible forks are so difficult to determine the endpoint.

Places to explore

At the beginning of the game.There is a tasks point closest to you.You can know where to go next to complete these tasks.You can judge your way forward by short mission description information.

Take action

The retention value or spiritual power can enable you to quickly leave when in danger.You must always pay attention to the changes in this number,as it becomes difficult to maintain longer running time and speed when the value becomes too low.

Life lies in exploration

You need to have health value to recover your stamina. Health value and Spirit value interact with each other. After being attacked by strange creatures, the remaining health value will be reduced. You can avoid these strange creatures after exploring some maze environments. Usually, these strange creatures have a very strong attack power. Good luck to you!

You can avoid these strange creatures after exploring some maze environments. Usually, these strange creatures have a very strong attack power. Good luck to you!

Moving forward in the light

Underground caves and tunnels are usually not exposed to sunlight. Darkness will accompany you for a long time. In order to see the path ahead clearly, you must have a tool that helps you illuminate. At the start of the game or in the nearby area, you can find some tools for lighting.

Strange stones and chaotic caves

There are many strange stones hidden in the dark cave. The spirit of exploration drives people to go to these places to unravel those mysterious phenomena.
name: 黑洞迷宫 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In this game, there are several young people who are very adventure and exploring.They discover a mysterious tunnel and embark on a series of fantastic adventures.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Russian, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
